episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 3/06/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael talks with Christy Zartler, her daughter has cerebral palsy & severe Autism which leads her to injury herself and cannabis treatment really works for her; Why republicans are wrong on marijuana.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 3/06/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael talks with MLB legend Nolan Ryan. From growing up in a small TX town, to his first major league contract; nothing is off limits.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 3/03/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Pop-A-Top Friday! Michael takes your calls on anything and everything as we try to put life into perspective.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 3/03/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: It's Open Line Friday on The Michael Berry Show! Michael takes your calls about anything and everything on your mind to wrap up the week.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 3/02/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: The media tries (and fails) to make a story out of Jeff Sessions;  Nancy Pelosi whines about Republicans hiding their replacement Obamacare bill; Where was the outrage when Holder and Lynch broke the law A caller says Trump is weak for not defending his lieutenants; Corrine Brown says shes targeted because I'm a Black Woman With a Mouth.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 3/02/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Texas independent day; Michael talks with Christy Zartler, her daughter has cerebral palsy & severe Autism which leads her to injury herself and cannabis treatment really works for her; Why republicans are wrong on marijuana.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 3/01/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: An Iowa lawmaker claimed degree came from company that ran a Sizzler ; Michael takes your calls on President Trump's speech; Athletes that don't perform on Holy days; Remembering fallen soldiers; Famous Jewish athletes.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 3/01/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Houston Police Officer's Union President Ray Hunt give an update on the injured officers; Trump has his best speech so far last night; How little league relates to the US.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 2/28/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael sits down with legendary MLB fastballer Nolan Ryan. They talk about his career in and out of the majors, and growing up in Texas.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 2/28/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Police in North Texas warn people about stealing Whataburger order number table tents; Kellyanne Conway is getting blow back for sitting with her feet up in the oval office; LIGHTNING ROUND: Things you've stolen.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Trumps budget proposals are in; Michael talks about the concept of Mmanufacturing in America; Obamacare and pre-existing conditions; Michael takes calls on listener suggested healthcare plans.

episodes.summary: An update on Ramon's health; the big mistake at the Oscars; Joyce the Sage of Sunnyside calls in; Michael thinks the food at Dairy Queen is underrated.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Pop-A-Top Friday is here! Michael toasts the heart and soul of the show, Mr. Ramon Robles. He also takes your calls on anything and everything.

episodes.summary: Since the election, the economy seems to be picking up as Michael takes calls from people have seen an uptick in business; plus, what was the first CD, cassette or 8-track you album you bought?  and, Michael remembers Iwo Jima

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 2/22/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael talks with Vickie Williams Tillman, the woman who jumped on top of a man who was attacking a Baton Rouge Police Officer; Craig Gotwalls checks in and we talk about the IRS accepting tax returns missing health care coverage.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: The Mayor of Tucson, AZ was carjacked in broad daylight; What to expect from President Trump's new Executive Order; A Washington teacher is on leave over a Facebook post encouraging the deportation of 'Illegal Aliens'.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael about the growing situation with Michael Flynn; Valentine's Day; and remembering to treat your wife like you treat your little girl; LIGHTNING ROUND: The Song You Danced To At Your Wedding.

episodes.author: KTRH

episodes.author: KTRH

episodes.summary: Michael speak to author Alan Elliot about his book, Texas Ingenuity: Lone Star Inventions, Inventor & Innovators; plus George HW Bush pens letter to Trump, apologizing for not going to inauguration; Bernie Sanders lectures Trumps HHS nominee, telling him America is not compassionate.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 1/18/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Jeff Bagwell get in to the Baseball Hall of Fame; People can't stop thinking about Chelsea Manning's gender; Michael talks about waiting tables.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: The rain is falling in Houston and the local TV news crews are going nuts as Michael talks about their over the top coverage; plus, how the left is losing their minds over Trump; and the most memorable commercials of all time.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 01/17/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Obama has commuted the bulk of Chelsea Mannings sentence; Michael takes a call from a 91-year-old man named Harold; A soul legend is performing at the Trump inauguration.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 1/17/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael speaks to Bill Johnson with the National Association of Police Organizations on Obama treatment of police over the 8 years; plus, Michael wonders what happened to the white running back; and, what have you bought from the 'want' ads.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Rep. John Lewis has played democrats for fools; There was a shooting at an MLK parade.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Pop-A-Top Friday! Michael takes your thought on most anything on your mind. We welcome Invicto in studiop to play a few tunes.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: The newly elected Democratic Sen. Kamala Harris asked Rep. Mike Pompeo on Thursday for his views on gay marriage and climate change during his Senate confirmation hearing to become CIA director. Michael talks about women in the military.

episodes.title: Michael Berry: AM 1/12/16
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael speaks to Brandon Darby with Breitbart Texas about his reporting from the Mexican border; plus, Senate moves closer to repealing Obamacare; and Michael gives advice to people in sales

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 1/11/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael talks about stepping back and taking in the beauty the world has to offer; Sen. Ted Cruz joins us to talks about the Jeff Sessions confirmation hearing; We go over the Trump press conference.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 1/11/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael takes on click-bait journalism like BuzzFeed & Gawker; President-elect Trump speaks; and, Michael looks forward to a restaurant that only serves french fries opening up

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 1/10/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Dirty Jobs, Scholarships, and Podcaster: Michael Sits Down and Talks Shop with Mike Rowe. We also chat with Rich Little and Tippi Hedren in our first ever 'Old People Hour'.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 1/10/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Michael speaks to new HPD Chief Art Acevedo; plus he celebrates George Foreman's 60th birthday & asks why Houston doesn't have anything named after him; what's you entrance song if you were a fighter

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: People respond to Meryl Streep calling out Donald Trump at the Golden Globes; A man gets a ticket for letting his car warm up in his driveway on a cold day; Michael talks with a 911 dispatcher who got a call that her own house was on fire.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 1/9/17
episodes.author: KTRH

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: AM 1/5/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Four savages torture a mentally disabled man in Chicago and stream it live on Facebook; Greatest Superband: Traveling Wilbury's or The Highwaymen; the As Seen on TV 'My Pillow' company get BBB downgrade over their business practices.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 1/4/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: An American Idol finalist says he is upset after a Popeye's employee called him a 'White Boy'; Megyn Kelly supposedly turned down100 Million to stay at Fox News; Obama tells Democrats: 'Don't rescue' Republicans on 'Trumpcare'.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Things may be picking up again in the oil & gas sector; plus, letting old people die happily with cigarettes, cigars, booze or whatever their vice is; and how a newspaper in Oklahoma is paying a price for their endorsement of Hillary.

episodes.title: The Michael Berry Show: PM 1/3/17
episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: Megyn Kelly's big move to NBC; When smoking cigarettes used to be an act of defiance; Michael sums up what 2016 was politically.

episodes.author: KTRH
episodes.summary: The Czar is back from vacation and he discusses how overboard some people went over the deaths of Carrie Fisher & George Michael; plus, Michael talks about his favorite homo singers and the new Dream Liner plane he flew in
